mapper.select: select m.mem_num, m.mem_id, m.mem_name, m.mem_date, lh.lastsuccessedlogin, m.mem_state from tb_mem m, tb_login_history lh where m.mem_id = lh.mem_id(+) order by mem_date desc
select count(*) from tb_mem where mem_num > 0
select r.res_num, to_char(r.res_usedate,'yyyy-mm'), r.res_amount, r.res_state, r.mem_id, s.sp_name from tb_reserv r, tb_space s where r.mem_id=#{mem_id} and r.sp_num = s.sp_num
